verses.verse: In the second<WH8147> year<WH8141> of Darius<WH1867> the king<WH4428>, in the sixth<WH8345> month<WH2320>, in the first<WH259> day<WH3117> of the month<WH2320>, came the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> by<WH3027> Haggai<WH2292> the prophet<WH5030> unto Zerubbabel<WH2216> the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel<WH7597>, governor<WH6346> of Judah<WH3063>, and to Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Josedech<WH3087>, the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548>, saying<WH559>, by: Heb. by the hand of governor: or, captain

Thus speaketh<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, saying<WH559>, This people<WH5971> say<WH559>, The time<WH6256> is not come<WH935>, the time<WH6256> that the LORD'S<WH3068> house<WH1004> should be built<WH1129>.
Then came the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> by<WH3027> Haggai<WH2292> the prophet<WH5030>, saying<WH559>,
Is it time<WH6256> for you, O ye, to dwell<WH3427> in your cieled<WH5603> houses<WH1004>, and this house<WH1004> lie waste<WH2720>?
Now therefore thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>; Consider<WH7760> <WH3824> your ways<WH1870>. Consider: Heb. Set your heart on your ways

Ye have sown<WH2232> much<WH7235>, and bring<WH935> in little<WH4592>; ye eat<WH398>, but ye have not enough<WH7654>; ye drink<WH8354>, but ye are not filled with drink<WH7937>; ye clothe<WH3847> you, but there is none warm<WH2527>; and he that earneth wages<WH7936> earneth wages<WH7936> to put it into a bag<WH6872> with holes<WH5344>. with holes: Heb. pierced through
Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>; Consider<WH7760> <WH3824> your ways<WH1870>. Consider: Heb. Set your heart on your ways

Go up<WH5927> to the mountain<WH2022>, and bring<WH935> wood<WH6086>, and build<WH1129> the house<WH1004>; and I will take pleasure<WH7521> in it, and I will be glorified<WH3513>, saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>.

Ye looked<WH6437> for much<WH7235>, and, lo, it came to little<WH4592>; and when ye brought<WH935> it home<WH1004>, I did blow<WH5301> upon it. Why? saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>. Because<WH3282> of mine house<WH1004> that is waste<WH2720>, and ye run<WH7323> every man<WH376> unto his own house<WH1004>. blow: or, blow it away
Therefore the heaven<WH8064> over you is stayed<WH3607> from dew<WH2919>, and the earth<WH776> is stayed<WH3607> from her fruit<WH2981>.

And I called<WH7121> for a drought<WH2721> upon the land<WH776>, and upon the mountains<WH2022>, and upon the corn<WH1715>, and upon the new wine<WH8492>, and upon the oil<WH3323>, and upon that which the ground<WH127> bringeth forth<WH3318>, and upon men<WH120>, and upon cattle<WH929>, and upon all the labour<WH3018> of the hands<WH3709>.

Then Zerubbabel<WH2216> the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel<WH7597>, and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Josedech<WH3087>, the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548>, with all the remnant<WH7611> of the people<WH5971>, obeyed<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> their God<WH430>, and the words<WH1697> of Haggai<WH2292> the prophet<WH5030>, as the LORD<WH3068> their God<WH430> had sent<WH7971> him, and the people<WH5971> did fear<WH3372> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>.
Then spake<WH559> Haggai<WH2292> the LORD'S<WH3068> messenger<WH4397> in the LORD'S<WH3068> message<WH4400> unto the people<WH5971>, saying<WH559>, I am with you, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>.

And the LORD<WH3068> stirred up<WH5782> the spirit<WH7307> of Zerubbabel<WH2216> the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel<WH7597>, governor<WH6346> of Judah<WH3063>, and the spirit<WH7307> of Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Josedech<WH3087>, the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548>, and the spirit<WH7307> of all the remnant<WH7611> of the people<WH5971>; and they came<WH935> and did<WH6213> work<WH4399> in the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, their God<WH430>,
In the four<WH702> and twentieth<WH6242> day<WH3117> of the sixth<WH8345> month<WH2320>, in the second<WH8147> year<WH8141> of Darius<WH1867> the king<WH4428>.
